mapper.insert: insert into member_dto ( member_id, pw, name, gender, email ) values ( #{memberId}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email} )
mapper.select: select * from member_dto where member_id = #{memberId} and pw = #{pw};
mapper.update: update member_dto set pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email} where member_id = #{memberId}
